documents.name: Terms of Service
documents.text:
Also...

Don't upload copyrighted material, harassment, spam, or anything that might be illegal.

The terms of service (ToS) govern your use of this site. By accessing this site, you are indicating your acknowledgment and acceptance of the terms of service. The terms of service are subject to change at any time at our discretion. Your use of this site after such changes are implemented constitutes your acknowledgment and acceptance of the changes. Please consult the terms of service regularly.

Vidble reserves the right to remove or replace any uploaded files, and assumes no liability for lost registration links or misplaced file URLs.

The following types of files constitute "abuse" and may not be uploaded under any circumstances, when using Vidble's Media Hosting:

Files that violate any law or may be considered to violate any law.

Files that infringe on the copyrights of any entity excluding the user.

Gore intended to be offensive, disgusting and/or disturbing to viewers.

Uploading abusive files may result in the immediate termination of the user's ability to use Vidble or any of its provided services. The Vidble website may not load, all Vidble-hosted files may not load, and all files related to the abusive files will be subject to deletion. Circumventing Vidble's ability to enforce the Vidble Terms of Service will result in prosecution.

To report any type of abuse, send email using the Request Deletion page.

All information provided by the user is strictly confidential. Vidble reserves the right to distribute aggregated demographic information provided by the user, but Vidble will never release any personal information about the user without permission. However, Vidble reserves the right to release user information if user has violated the Vidble Terms of Service, if the information is subpoenaed, or if the user has committed unlawful acts.

All Vidble art and text on this website are copyrighted.

All files are copyrighted © to their respective owners. Vidble directs full legal responsibility of files to their respective users.

Vidble is not responsible for the content of any uploaded files, nor is it in affiliation with any entities that may be represented in the uploaded files.

User's use of Vidble's services is entirely at his or hers own risk. If you are dissatisfied with any aspect of Vidble's Service or with these terms &. conditions, or any other rules or policies, your sole remedy is to discontinue the use of the Service. Vidble's services are provided on an "as is" basis without warranties of any kind, either expressed or implied, constructive, or statutory, including, without limitation, any implied warranties of merchantability, non-infringement or fitness for a particular purpose.

Vidble makes no guarantee of availability of service and reserves the right to change, withdraw, suspend, or discontinue any functionality or feature of Vidble's services. In no event shall Vidble be liable for any damages whatsoever. This includes direct, indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising out of the use of or inability to use Vidble's services or any content thereon.

Notification of Claims of Infringement

If you believe that your work has been copied in a way that constitutes copyright infringement, or that your intellectual property rights have been otherwise violated, please provide the following information to our agent:

Identification of the material that you claim is infringing, with enough detail that we can locate it on the site.

A statement that you have a good faith belief that the material's use is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

A statement declaring under penalty of perjury that (a) the above information in your notice is accurate, and (b) that you are the owner of the copyright interest involved or that you are authorized to act on behalf of that owner.

Your address, telephone number, and email address

Your physical or electronic signature.

Our agent for notice of claims of copyright or other intellectual property infringement can be reached as follows: abuse@Vidble.com

Indemnity

User agrees to indemnify and hold Vidble harmless from any loss, liability, claims, damages and expenses, including attorneys fees, arising from or related to the content, use, or deletion of User's Files or use of any other feature or service. This expressly includes: User's responsibility for any and all liability arising from the violation or infringement of proprietary rights or copyrights. Any defamatory or unlawful material contained within User's Files.

Waiver

By accepting these terms, you waive and hold harmless company from any claims resulting from any action taken by Vidble during or as a result of its investigations and/or from any actions taken as a consequence of investigations by either Vidble or law enforcement authorities.

Maintenance

Vidble may perform maintenance services at anytime. User acknowledges that such maintenance may require downtime, and images hosted on Vidble may not load during this time.

Miscellaneous

These Terms of Use will be governed and interpreted pursuant to the laws of King County, Washington United States of America, notwithstanding any principles of conflicts of law. You specifically consent to personal jurisdiction in King County, WA in connection with any dispute between you and Company arising out of these Terms of Use or pertaining to the subject matter hereof. The parties to these Terms of Use each agree that the exclusive venue for any dispute between the parties arising out of these Terms of Use or pertaining to the subject matter of these Terms of Use will be in the state and federal courts in King County, Washington. If any part of these Terms of Use is unlawful, void or unenforceable, that part will be deemed severable and will not affect the validity and enforceability of any remaining provisions. These Terms of Use constitute the entire agreement among the parties relating to this subject matter. Notwithstanding the foregoing, any additional terms and conditions on this site will govern the items to which they pertain. Vidble may revise these Terms of Use at any time by updating this posting.

points.title: The service makes critical changes to its terms without user involvement
The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk
Users are free to choose the type of copyright license that they want to use over their content
Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent merely from your usage.
The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk
Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder
You have the right to leave this service at any time
Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent merely from your usage.
This service reserves the right to disclose your personal information without notifying you
Your personal data is aggregated into statistics
The service can suspend your account for several reasons
The service can delete specific content without reason and may do it without prior notice
The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service
Users agree not to use the service for illegal purposes
This service prohibits users sending chain letters, junk mail, spam or any unsolicited messages
The court of law governing the terms is in King County, WA, USA.
Users agree not to submit illegal content
The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service
Provides instructions on how to submit a copyright claim
This service only shares user information with third parties when given specific consent
This service reserves the right to disclose your personal information without notifying you
Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user
You are solely responsible for claims made against the service and agree to indemnify and hold harmless the service.
